comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: The mother here is Mary Sibbet Copley Thaw (1843-1929): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Sibbet_Copley The daughter is Margaret Copley Thaw Carnegie, later Countess de Perigny (1877-1942): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Margaret_Copley_Thaw

comment._content: Ha! The shadow of the photographer makes it look like the woman on the left is hovering in the air!
